name: Haunted Haiku Generator
description:
Picture this: You are an angry teenager in the nineties, standing alone in the forest and being mad at the world.

Haunted Haiku Generator

The new procrastination app by SexDrugsVideoGames will deliver you the freshest Haiku inspired by you favorite bands.
For mature players only.

Warning for all the content.

Made with Godot Engine
